definition: grain/granule/classifier for small round things (peas, bullets, peanuts, pills, grains etc)

sentences.english: Result Both mutanolysin and lysozyme could successfully lyse the wall of bifidobacterium and extract the plasmid from Bifidobacterium.
sentences.chinese: 结果球孢链霉菌发酵液与溶菌酶均成功提取到质粒。

sentences.english: Positive clones of F gene were identified by PCR and restriction enzyme digestion and then sequenced.
sentences.chinese: 经质粒PCR及酶切鉴定后，对阳性克隆进行测序。

sentences.english: The survival time of mice after immunization with the combined plasmids after challenging with the ZS_2 tachyzoites was prolonged.
sentences.chinese: 混合质粒注射和小鼠抗弓形虫感染的存活时间延长。

sentences.english: The recombinant attenuated S. typhimurium can parasite in the intestinal tract for a long time and be safe for the rats.
sentences.chinese: 可在大鼠肠道较持久的寄生，并能较稳定地携带质粒。

sentences.english: New phages can develop by acquiring restriction enzymes from plasmids.
sentences.chinese: 通过从质粒获得的限制性酶，新的噬菌体能够生长。

sentences.english: In addition, constructed plasmids can be by gap repair of this technology.
sentences.chinese: 此外可运用该技术中缺口修复的方法构建质粒。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the mechanisms of resistance plasmid in Klebsiella pneumoniae.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨耐药性质粒在肺炎克雷伯杆菌中的耐药机制。

sentences.english: One of the ways to introduce genes into a bacterium is to introduce a plasmid into it.
sentences.chinese: 其中一个为细菌加入新基因的方法是引入质粒。

sentences.english: The control group was only given equivalent liposomes except plasmid.
sentences.chinese: 对照组只给予等量的脂质体，不加入质粒。

sentences.english: The effect of low copy number mutation on the stability of the recombinant plasmids was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 文中对质粒的稳定性与拷贝数的关系作了讨论。

sentences.english: The plasmid was obtained and identified by alkali splitting and gel electrophoresis.
sentences.chinese: 碱裂解法抽提质粒，琼脂糖电泳分析目的质粒。

sentences.english: The plasmid was obtained and identified by alkali splitting and gel electrophoresis.
sentences.chinese: 碱裂解法抽提质粒，琼脂糖电泳分析目的质粒。

sentences.english: Objective To construct a bait plasmid in bacterial two-hybrid system.
sentences.chinese: 目的构建大肠杆菌双杂交系统的诱饵重组质粒。

sentences.english: The plasmids caused the cells to turn into iPS cells.
sentences.chinese: 这些质粒将细胞转变成诱导性多功能干细胞。

sentences.english: The relationship of biomass growth and concentration of plasmid was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了包括菌体生长和质粒含量等的关系。

sentences.english: In this review, we summarize the current progresses on plasmid biology in the rare actinomycetes.
sentences.chinese: 本文综述目前稀有放线菌中的质粒生物学的研究进展。

definition: single chain/refers to RNA as opposed to the double helix DNA
